steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"9l9eu","text":"Add    of staining buffer to cell pellet and incubate for   at   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":59,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":63,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"9pq49","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"100","error":false,"guid":"A9BD7E90BC7011ECAC8503C17294E9DF","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"AE3216C0BC7011ECAC8503C17294E9DF","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"2":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"B5552D20BC7011ECAC8503C17294E9DF","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"4","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4lbn7","text":"Add  ADT Antibody and incubate for   at  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":35,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":40,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"f0cm5","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"2","error":false,"guid":"BA45D320BC7011ECAC8503C17294E9DF","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":1800,"guid":"C544C420BC7011ECAC8503C17294E9DF","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"2":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"C7987820BC7011ECAC8503C17294E9DF","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"4","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6het0","text":"Centrifuge and discard staining buffer","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ekv3q","text":"(Determine the centrifugation rcf depending on the cell line)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7coeg","text":"Dilute cells with PBSB (1,000 cells/μl is recommended)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2vgv","text":"(PBSB : PBS supplemented with 0.1% BSA)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5h25d","text":"Wash Poly T beads 3 times with   of PBSB","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":31,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"4t3bu","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1","error":false,"guid":"E549F0B0BC7011ECAC8503C17294E9DF","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8ekvn","text":"Add 10,000 cells to beads and incubate for 1h at 4C","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3rs51","text":"※ In PBMC experiment, considering the ratio of each cell types of PBMC","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7hljk","text":"(Since antibody efficiencies vary by cell type, the number of cells should be adjusted for each experiment)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7l9qs","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6ojer","text":"Transfer   of solutions (containing bead-cell complexes) to 20um pluriSelect 20μm strainer","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":9,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"3g07t","text":"(Check the picture below for strainer and sytinge setting)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1rp1k","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"9cc5b","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"100","error":false,"guid":"F5A25BA0BC7011ECAC8503C17294E9DF","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"A2A7EAD0BC7211EC951BA7E70D6E2538","height":412,"id":229343,"is_video":false,"legend":"","mime":"image/jpeg","nestedSelector":null,"original_name":"syringe.jpg","placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/g99bbrfjp.jpg","shadow":false,"source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/g989brfjp.jpg","webp_placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/g99abrfjp.webp","webp_source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/g988brfjp.webp","width":550}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fu6ht","text":"Invert the strainer and transfer bead-cell complexes to 12 well plate with adding of   incubation buffer","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":85,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"ndj8","text":"(Incubation buffer : 6% Ficoll PM-400, 20mM EDTA, 0.2M Tris pH 7.5)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1","error":false,"guid":"48365790BC7111ECAC8503C17294E9DF","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}
